page.name: Force of Nature
page.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. A powerful geomancer used all the forces of the planet in the creation of this fantastic magic staff. It has its own gravity, and atmosphere.

properties.name: Force of Nature
properties.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. A powerful geomancer used all the forces of the planet in the creation of this fantastic magic staff. It has its own gravity, and atmosphere.

page.name: Yaga Stone Circle
page.description: After being handed a note by Thursday, you make your way to the ancient stone circle which the Five Yaga Sisters call home to stop them from summoning the Strange Outworlder to destroy Lore.

properties.name: Yaga Stone Circle
properties.description: After being handed a note by Thursday, you make your way to the ancient stone circle which the Five Yaga Sisters call home to stop them from summoning the Strange Outworlder to destroy Lore.
properties.complete: You have defeated the Strange Outworlder, also known as Guffer. Who knew that a pot-bellied furball could hit so hard?
